s.text: The one problem with all this: despite the apparent oddity of the home run ball case, not one of these horrified public servants has shown why it isn't a perfectly straightforward application of the gift tax.

The one problem with all this: despite the apparent oddity of the home run ball case, not one of these horrified public servants has shown why it isn't a perfectly straightforward application of the gift tax.
Reno has, explains the paper, reviewed the issue ad issue at least three times before, but each time stopped after an initial 30-day review.
